title: 27 copywriting clichés tech businesses need to delete
text: The deeper I get into this research, the more I start to recognize patterns in the ways tech companies talk about themselves. And, unfortunately, it's quite common for these companies to copy rather than steal.

title: 1 stupidly simple tip to help you write copy of your dreams
text: The first step is to find brands that you think are going incredible work for the same type of copy/content you're trying to produce. If you need to create a killer tagline or slogan (See: Taglines vs. slogans: What's the difference?), find a brand that does them well. Ctrl+c that piece of writing, stat.

title: The no-nonsense copywriting checklist for clarity and impact
text: Your copywriting needs to do all that in a matter of seconds.

title: The no-nonsense copywriting checklist for clarity and impact
text: I'm a fan of Grammarly. If you're interested in a free alternative, be sure to check out Hemingway.

title: The no-nonsense copywriting checklist for clarity and impact
text: I even wrote an entire piece about tech clichés new and old.
